explanation.message: If you use this option, you must be aware of the following.

explanation_problem1.message: When expanded function become invalid, the already released tab will be closed.

explanation_solution.message: If tabs has closed, you'll use 'Emergency recovery' of popup menu immediately, so restore closed tabs.

explanation_problem2.message: Unless the internet connection environment is possible, it does not work properly.
